column1: '''The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology''' is a box set of three video games for the PC by [[Electronic Arts]]. The set was released on [[1 March
column2: March 1]], [[2007]], and consists of the following games:
The Lord of the Rings:The Battle for Middle-earth]]
The Lord of the Rings:The Battle for Middle-earth II]]

column1: * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]] (expansion)
